summary: Completed frontend testing for child-friendly explanatory banners on key pages. All yellow banners with child-friendly explanations are working correctly on Wallet, Investment/Money Garden, Store, Quests, and Learn pages. Dashboard wallet section is now titled 'My Money Jars' with explanation text, and wallet account cards are clickable links to the wallet page.
passed_tests: ✅ Wallet page has yellow banner with 'Welcome to Your Wallet!' title
✅ Wallet page banner explains 'digital piggy bank' concept
✅ Wallet page banner explains '4 special jars' concept
✅ Investment page has yellow banner with 'What is the Stock Market?' (for grade 3+ users)
✅ Investment page banner explains stocks and investing for children
✅ Store page has yellow banner with 'How Does the Store Work?' title
✅ Store page banner explains 'practice store' concept
✅ Store page banner mentions 'Spending jar' and 'spend carefully'
✅ Quests page has yellow banner with 'What Are Quests?' title
✅ Quests page banner explains 'missions' and earning ₹
✅ Learn page has yellow banner with 'How Does Learning Work?' title
✅ Learn page banner explains topics, lessons, activities, and games
✅ Learn page banner mentions earning ₹ for completing activities
✅ Dashboard wallet section titled 'My Money Jars'
✅ Dashboard has explanation text 'Your ₹ is organized in 4 special jars. Tap any jar to learn more!'
✅ Dashboard wallet account cards are clickable Links to /wallet
✅ Dashboard wallet cards show account type, description, and balance
✅ All yellow banners use gradient from-[#FFD23F] to-[#FFEB99]
seed_data_creation: Created test user with grade 3 and wallet accounts (spending: ₹100, savings: ₹150, investing: ₹75, giving: ₹50, total: ₹375) in wallet_accounts collection.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All child-friendly explanatory banners are working correctly. Yellow banners (bg-gradient-to-r from-[#FFD23F] to-[#FFEB99]) are present on Wallet, Investment, Store, Quests, and Learn pages. Dashboard wallet section is titled 'My Money Jars' with clickable account cards that link to /wallet. For grade 3+ users, Investment page shows 'Stock Market' terminology; for younger users (grade ≤2), it shows 'Money Garden' terminology.
